modShortDescription: It is possible to configure trader separately so that they differ in requirements.
modDescription:
It is possible to configure [trader](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-trader/) separately so that they differ in requirements.

**Settings that can be changed:**

* Buy markup
* Sell markdown
* Product update in game days
* Full reset
* Minimum number of items
* Maximum number of items
* Min items swapped
* Max items swapped
* Trader opening time
* Trader closing time

**[Download](https://github.com/sLimLong/Trader-Settings/archive/main.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/23340-trader-settings/).

**Credits:** [Slimlong103](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/slimlong103/)
